order_id_number: Order ID must be a number
order_detail_id_number: Order detail ID must be a number
order_detail_id_positive: Order detail ID must be positive
invalid_item_status: Item status must be one of: out_of_stock, quantity_insufficient, item_canceled, picked_successfully, replaced
picked_quantity_number: Picked quantity must be a number
start_date_invalid: Start date must be a valid date
start_date_format: Start date must be in ISO format
end_date_invalid: End date must be a valid date
end_date_format: End date must be in ISO format
end_date_after_start: End date must be after start date
response_time_already_started: Response time tracking already started for this item
response_time_not_found: Response time record not found or already completed
start_response_error: Failed to start response time tracking
end_response_error: Failed to end response time tracking
duplicate_record: Duplicate record - cannot track time twice for the same item
no_data_available: No data available for the specified period
